Test Name: Should successfully login with valid credentials
Description: Validates successful login flow with correct credentials, verifies secure area access, includes 10-second wait

Test Name: Should show error message with invalid username
Description: Validates proper error handling when invalid username is provided

Test Name: Should show error message with invalid password
Description: Validates proper error handling when invalid password is provided

Test Name: Should show error message with both invalid credentials
Description: Validates error handling when both username and password are invalid

Test Name: Should be able to logout after successful login
Description: Validates complete user journey: login → secure area → logout → return to login page
